dmca.title: NOTICE IS INSULTING, RATHER THAN LEGAL IN NATURE
dmca.body:
Alan,

You really can be an obnoxious obsessive compulsive anal retentive twit. Do you do anything else aside from living in front of your computer trying to start flame wars with other people? For such an anal and detail oriented individual you seem to have missed a key part of my site. Just to help you out I have included it below:

"Unless otherwise noted, all photographs and images on this page are copyright protected property of Madoc Pope. If you would like to use any of my images you must contact me first before you do so."

I don't recall you asking me permission to use my photographs. Please cease and desist. You do not have my permission to use my images in any way shape or form.

Go away and stop bothering me. Find someone else to plague and obsess over.

Sincerely,

Madoc Pope
